column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Three Chinese men who kidnapped five Chinese women were place in pre-trial detention by Phnom Penh Municipal Court
column5: 2019. Two other suspects are still at large.------The three Chinese men
column10: 32 were arrested on the morning of April 21 in Preah Sihanouk province. Two remaining Chinese women were rescued in the operation after three had been let go in Kampot.------Two other Chinese men managed to escape.------Original story ------HERE------Arrest story ------HERE------Rasmei
